highlights: Designed, built, and shipped **TruNorth**, an AI-powered career navigation platform, owning the full lifecycle from product ideation to deployment; **won 3rd place** for technical execution and real-world applicability.

Engineered data-intensive reporting and document processing automations, reducing processing time by **40‚Äì50%** and improving accuracy and reliability.
Delivered a portfolio of cross-functional automations that collectively unlocked **14‚Äì18 hrs/day of operational capacity**, earning direct recognition from executive leadership.
